import React from 'react' import {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Categories(props) { const [category,setcategory] =useState([]) const handle=(val)=>{ console.log('sjkkkk',val) axios({ method:'post', data:{'search':val}, withCredentials: true, url:'http://localhost:5000/filterPost' }).then(result=>{ localStorage.setItem('filterData',JSON.stringify(result.data)) props.setresultAllPost(result.data) }).catch(err=>{ console.log(err) }) } return ( <>
Categories
  • handle("Cat")}> {" "} CATS
  • handle("Dog")}> {" "} Dogs
  • handle("Bird")}> {" "} Birds
  • handle("Rabbit")}> {" "} Rabbit
  • handle("Other")}> {" "} Others
) } export default Categories
